content:
Prev: Sunset traffic, downtown Amherst Up: Amherst College and environs Next: Woods behind Smith House

Smith House



Not the world's most photogenic building, but we were asked to bring back a picture of Dashi's house.
Taken Monday, November 19, 2001, 07:29:22am.  Original image size: 1600x1200, 422kb
Technical details: Olympus C700UZ, 1/25s @ F8.0, ISO 100, 89mm
PS6 Curves 0:0 - 30:35 - 140:180 - 255:255, R 0:0 - 190:180 - 255:225, B 0:0 - 40:30 - 130:120 - 255:255, USM 30:100 - 20:20 - 30:4 - 100:0.5, USM sign 150:0.5
